abstract.t: This document describes the Namespace Identifier (NID) 'etsi' for Uniform Resource Names (URNs) used to identify resources published by European Telecommuncations Standards Instititue (http://etsi.org). ETSI specifies and manages resources that utilize this URN identification model. Management activities for these and other resources types are handled by the manager of the ETSI Protocol Naming and Numbering Service (PNNS).
